```{r solution, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
my_df <- dplyr::tibble(x = -100:100, 
                       y = x + 5)

# solution
library(tidyverse)

my_df2 <- my_df %>%
  filter(y > 0)

# solution
my_sol <- nrow(my_df2)
```
